field.label: Certificate data
field.help: Paste a certificate in X.509 PEM format here.

field.label: Certificate Private Key
field.help: Paste the private key for the above certificate here. This is optional in most cases, but required if you need to generate a Certificate Revocation List (CRL)."

field.label: Serial for next certificate
field.help: Enter a decimal number to be used as the serial number for the next certificate to be created using this CA.
